mapper.select: SELECT N.name as nur_name, N.employeeId as nur_id, N.position as nur_position, Dep.id as dep_id, Dep.name as dep_name FROM Nurse N JOIN Departments Dep ON N.Departments_id = Dep.id WHERE N.employeeId = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Nurse SET name=#{name}, position=#{position} WHERE employeeId=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Nurse (employeeId, name, position, Departments_id) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{position},#{department.id})
